venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
What You Resist, Persists - Overcome Procrastination Today!
Do it now! Feel good about yourself! 

Stop procrastination in its tracks and transform 
it into Inspired Action.
 
Procrastination is one of the Habits of Failure. 

Feeling overwhelmed with unfinished tasks? Learn several 
simple techniques that allow you to conquer your avoidance 
behavior, easily organize your life, find more energy, and 
accomplish more than you could ever dream possible.


Enjoy a group hypnosis session.



Attendance by donation. Suggested donation : $10.00

100% of all proceeds donated to Our Weeping Angel Foundation, a non-profit 
foundation that helps people gain access to holistic healthcare. 




 




See also: http://www.hypnosis.ws

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Overcoming Procrastination - hypnosis seminar
